tutorial: 4. Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages
type: Tutorial Step - In The Mean Time!

definition.text: If you are willing to keep going on your own, mastering building strategies requires some reading and a lot of practice!

paragraphs.text: Continue your education by reading the following sections of the documentation:
The nuances of stages of trading strategies.
The whole trading engine section.
The whole section on the trading bot.
You may keep developing what we started on this series, or go your own way and start implementing your own idea! Good luck, and see you on the next tutorial!
